description: Creates a history from a Probe stream

properties.name: historyname
properties.label: History Name
properties.description: Assign a name to this history to identify the stream to assign it to a dashboard component.

properties.name: continue
properties.label: Continue Last Value
properties.description: The probe stream only delivers updates when it has new/updated values. The history uses either the last value in each update interval or resets it to 0. This depends on how the dashboard component needs it. A throughput chart needs the last value while a revenue charts requires to reset it to 0.

properties.name: func
properties.label: Function
properties.description: Function to perform on the data.

properties.name: updateintervalsec
properties.label: Update Interval Seconds
properties.description: Interval in seconds in which the updates are sent to the dashboard component.

properties.name: labely
properties.label: Label Y Axis Dashboard
properties.description: Specify the label for the Y axis for dashboard charts.

properties.name: fieldlabels
properties.label: Field Labels
properties.description: Add a label for each field in the probe stream for dashboard charts.
